action.label: &Goto
action.tooltip: Send/undo commands to reach the current location

action.label: Send All
action.tooltip: Process the rest of this file

action.label: Undo All
action.tooltip: Undo to the beginning of this file

action.label: &Enter Command
action.tooltip: Enter a command to send directly to the prover

action.label: &Open Definition
action.tooltip: Try to find where a term was defined, and show that definition.

command.description: Undo the last theorem prover command
command.name: Undo Last

command.description: Send the next command out to the theorem prover
command.name: Send Next

command.description: Try to interrupt the theorem prover (could kill it)
command.name: Interrupt

command.description: Open the definition for a term, if it can be found
command.name: Open Definition

command.description: Toggle between symbol tokens and ASCII
command.name: Toggle Symbols

wizard.name: Proof Project
wizard.description: Create a new theorem proving project.

decorator.label: Active Script Decorator
decorator.description: Decorates a proof script file according to its state of completion in the prover.

decorator.label: Error Decorator
decorator.description: Decorates scripts which cause prover errors.

action.label: Add/Remove Proof Nature
action.tooltip: Add or remove the proof nature for this project

cheatsheet.name: Getting Started with Proof General
cheatsheet.description: This Cheat Sheet shows you how to create a proof project in Proof General and add a proof script.

colorDefinition.label: Keywords
colorDefinition.description: Colour of keywords in the proof script editor.

colorDefinition.label: Strings
colorDefinition.description: Colour of strings in the proof script editor.

colorDefinition.label: Comments
colorDefinition.description: Colour of comments in the proof script editor.

colorDefinition.label: Holes
colorDefinition.description: Colour of replacable holes in the proof script editor.

colorDefinition.label: Console input
colorDefinition.description: Colour for displaying input text sent to the prover in the PGIP Console.

fontDefinition.label: Console Font
fontDefinition.description: Font for Proof General consoles (for debug or tracing messages from the prover, and the PGIP log).

property.name: aboutText
property.value:
Proof General Eclipse Version 1.0.x (a beta version).
Developed at the School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh and the Department of Mathematics and Informatics, University of Bremen.
Project website: http://proofgeneral.inf.ed.ac.uk
(c) Copyright University of Edinburgh, University of Bremen, contributors and others, 2005-7.
With Prover's Palette extensions, (c) Laura Meikle 2009.
